general: Sensor: 1/4” CMOS Sensor Board Lens Focal Length: 4 mm F/No: 1.5 Minimum illumination: 0 lux Focus Depth: 20 cm ~ infinity View: Digital Zoom: 4x Horizontal: 51.8° Vertical: 33.8° Diagonal: 59.6°
power: Input: 100 ~ 240Vac, 50/60 Hz, 0.2A Output: 12Vdc, 1.25A external power adapter
pantilt: Pan: -170° ~ +170° Tilt: up 90°and down 25° Auto-Patrol preset positions: 10
audio: Built-in omni-directional microphone Sensitivity: -40 dB +/- 3 dB (5 meters max) Frequency: 100~20000 Hz S/N: >60 dB Format: PCM / ADPCM External speaker output (speaker sold separately) Two-way audio with echo canceling
daynight: Built-in ICR Nigh vision (IR) supports up to 7.5 meters*
network: IEEE 802.3u 10/100 Mbps Auto-MDIX Fast Ethernet  IEEE 802.3af Power over Ethernet (PoE)
